label: Planting
title: Planting that looks great and suits your level of upkeep
description: Practical plant choices and tidy bed finishing—so your garden looks better now and stays manageable long-term.

hero.imageAlt: Tidy garden border and lawn with a clean, refreshed look
hero.caption: Better planting makes the whole space feel more intentional.

included.label: What’s included
included.title: A tidy planting upgrade that feels worth it
included.description: We’ll help choose sensible plants, place them properly, and leave a neat finish—so it looks intentional and stays manageable.

items.title: Plant selection advice
items.description: Options that match your space and how much upkeep you want.

items.title: Bed tidy and prep
items.description: A clean base so the planting looks sharp.

items.title: Spacing and layout
items.description: A practical layout that grows in well over time.

items.title: Soil improvement (as needed)
items.description: Better soil supports healthier, more reliable growth.

items.title: Mulch/finish option
items.description: A clean finish that makes beds look more complete.

items.title: Waste removal (optional)
items.description: Clear-up can include taking waste away if needed.

valueBand.label: Value
valueBand.title: Planting that looks good and stays manageable
valueBand.description: The best planting upgrades are the ones you can keep up with—practical choices, tidy finish, and a layout that grows in well.

bullets.title: Looks more intentional
bullets.description: A tidy bed layout changes the feel of the whole space.

bullets.title: Matches your upkeep level
bullets.description: Choices that suit how much time you want to spend maintaining.

bullets.title: Done properly
bullets.description: Clear plan, clear quote, and a clean finish.

faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: Can you recommend plants for low maintenance?
items.answer: Yes. Tell us what you like and how much upkeep you want, and we’ll recommend practical options.

items.question: Do you supply the plants?
items.answer: We can. We’ll discuss budget and the look you want, then include it in the quote.

items.question: When is the best time to plant?
items.answer: It depends on what you’re planting and the conditions. We’ll advise when quoting.

items.question: Do you prepare the beds first?
items.answer: Yes—bed prep and tidy is usually part of getting a clean, finished result.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.

finalCta.title: Want a planting upgrade that feels worth it?
finalCta.description: Tell us what you want improved and the look you’re after—then we’ll recommend a practical plan and quote it clearly.
